1{-# LANGUAGE ConstraintKinds #-}
2{-# LANGUAGE FlexibleInstances #-}
3{-# LANGUAGE FunctionalDependencies #-}
4{-# LANGUAGE MultiParamTypeClasses #-}
5{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
6
7{-| List class. -}
8
9module Koshucode.Baala.Overture.List
10 ( -- * List class
11   List (..),
12   (<:>),
13   cut2, cut3,
14   -- * List-like class.
15   L.ListLike (..),
16 ) where
17
18import qualified Data.ListLike                        as L
19import qualified Data.Text                            as Tx
20import qualified Data.Text.Lazy                       as Tz
21import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture.Infix       as O
22import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture.Shorthand   as O
23
24{-| List class. -}
25class (L.ListLike es e) => List es e | es -> e where
26
27    {-| Split first element and rest of list.
28
29        >>> cut "foo"
30        Just ('f',"oo")
31
32        >>> cut ""
33        Nothing
34        -}
35    cut :: es -> Maybe (e, es)
36    cut = L.uncons
37
38instance List [e] e where
39
40instance List O.Tx Char where
41    cut = Tx.uncons
42
43instance List O.Tz Char where
44    cut = Tz.uncons
45
46infixr 5 <:>
47
48{-| Add element to list.
49
50    >>> 'b' <:> "ar" :: String
51    "bar"
52    -}
53(<:>) :: (List es e) => e -> es -> es
54(<:>) = L.cons
55
56{-| Split first two elements and rest of list.
57
58    >>> cut2 "bar"
59    Just ('b', Just ('a', "r"))
60    -}
61cut2 :: (List es e) => es -> Maybe (e, Maybe (e, es))
62cut2 es = cut O.<$$> cut es
63
64{-| Split first three elements and rest of list.
65    
66    >>> cut3 "bar"
67    Just ('b', Just ('a', Just ('r', "")))
68
69    >>> cut3 "b"
70    Just ('b', Nothing)
71    -}
72cut3 :: (List es e) => es -> Maybe (e, Maybe (e, Maybe (e, es)))
73cut3 es = cut2 O.<$$> cut es
